Cabinet

Cabinet
 
Cabinet -> Events -> Hasher Total online:



About event:
Event held at the Coliseum. The goal - to kill as many opponents.
For each killed enemy you are given the award. The award is not given for killing too weak opponents.
You may use any items. Buffs are not removed before the fight.
Given 3 minutes to register, 1 minute on teleportation, 5 minutes of the fight.
If the winner will be determined before the battle ends automatically.
At the end of the event, all participants are resurrected, cured, and teleport back.
In case of death, the experience is not lost.
To register for the event, you can use the link (event must be active):
Registration in event (Relax)
Registration in event (Extreme)
Your level should be as specified in the announcement category.
If you do not want to participate, but you want to watch the battle - you can take advantage of the reviewing crystals or buy seats in the stands at the Arena Director.
